thread.title: Nestle's new sugar formula may salvage obesity scrutiny

title: Nestle's new sugar formula may salvage obesity scrutiny
text:
Nestle's new sugar formula may salvage obesity scrutiny 3:14am IST - 01:50 
Nestle is market testing a new sugar formula that it contends can give its candy bars reduced calories, as it seeks to head off changing consumer demands and obesity crackdowns by world governments. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Nestle is market testing a new sugar formula that it contends can give its candy bars reduced calories, as it seeks to head off changing consumer demands and obesity crackdowns by world governments.
